title: Journeys Through Greek Superstition: Evil Eyes, Coffee Readings, and More
description: "Journeys Through Greek Superstition" takes the reader into a world where stories, lore, and belief all intertwine. Hrisoula Gatzogiannis explains popular Greek traditions with anecdotes, historical background, and modern day practices. She delves into the widely proliferated and feared evil eye legend, coffee cup readings and what they mean, why certain days are ominous, and a variety of other superstitions that have survived to this day.
author: Hrisoula Gatzogiannis
